duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate front-end loader or forklift to move and load vehicles as required.
Maintain documentation of vehicle movement and conduct daily inspections of assigned machine.
Ensure maintenance of equipment according to company standards and customer contracts.
Assist with the maintenance of company equipment and vehicles.
Record vehicle information accurately and legibly using digital documentation and tracking devices.
Set up yard for auctions within company timelines and provide service to customers as needed.
Maintain a positive and professional demeanor while following yard guidelines for a safe working environment.
Load and unload vehicles as required and pass training and safety requirements.

education_certification.credential: HS diploma or GED preferred. Loader or forklift certification preferred.
